Pinterest Foto Download - Chrome Extension FREE
Pinterest Foto Download is a free Chrome extension that lets you easily download photos from Pinterest for personal use.

How to activate the extension:

1.Click the puzzle icon in your browser's extensions menu to access the plugin.
2.Enter your email address to activate the extension and click the "Activate" button.
3.Wait 20seconds for the system to verify your email.
4.Once verified, a small "Activate" button will appear.
5.Enjoy the full functionality of the extension!
Key Features:

Completely free of charge.
Occasional emails with helpful tips to enhance your experience.
You can unsubscribe from emails at any time.
